loginIns: Managing Your Number &â€¯SIM Inventoryâ€¯from the Cloud
loginInfoSaaS: A scalable and fully automated Software-as-a-Service solution that enables global mobile operators, and operators at group level, reliably and efficiently manage their telephone numbers and associated resources.
loginInfoOnPremise: A scalable and fully automated solution that enables global mobile operators, and operators at group level, reliably and efficiently manage their telephone numbers and associated resources.
welcomeToCompleteSolution:
Welcome to your 
 complete solution for
manageYourComplete:
Manage your complete 
 Number and SIM inventory from the cloudâ€¦
singleSourceOfTruth: A single source of truth for identifier resources, covering IMSIs, MSISDNs, ICCIDs and many more.
trackAndForecastSIMUsage: Track and forecast SIM usage, as well as automating and simplifying the SIM ordering process from manufacturers.
fullyConvergent: Fully convergent, providing support for fixed line as well as mobile.
multiTenancySupport: Multi-tenancy support for country, operations, and service group level controls.
designedIoInterface: Designed to interface with your networkâ€¦
designedInterface1: A scalable, and fully automated Software-as-a-Service solution that enables you to centralise across all your network and affiliate companies with one proven solution.
designedInterface2: Completely manage IMSIs, ICCIDs, MSISDNs, IMEIs, CPEs, IP address and all their linkages, regulations, reporting and lifecycle.
designedInterface3: Centralized management of SIM Ordering, IMSIs, Telephone Numbers and other associated resources
designedInterface4: Easy configuration of role-based access rights and configurable hierarchical groups with custom attributes
designedInterface5: Easy integration via REST API Gateway
designedInterface6: Conforms to TMF639 Resource Inventory Management API REST Specification
whyTNM1: A Single data repository that supports multiple data resource types and multiple service types
whyTNM2: Proven solution used by many telecoms' operators
whyTNM3: Easy-to-Use. Intuitive User interface to configure, manage & maintain number & SIM inventory
whyTNM4: Scalable and high-performace solution that is proven to manage large resource inventory
faq1Q: 1. Why do I need a number inventory system?
faq1A: Manual tracking of resources involving updating spreadsheets is labour intensive and exposes the task to easily made mistakes. Mistaken allocation of resources that have already been allocated can be very costly and provide a bad user experience.
faq2Q: 2. How do I integrate to NM platform?
faq2A: Our NM SaaS platform provide ready REST APIs for integration to your network application and systems. NM SaaS conforms to TMF639 Resource Inventory Management API REST Specification as well for seamless integration
faq3Q: 3. What are the benefits of a cloud SaaS subscription vs on-premises deployment?
faq3A: Subscribing to NM Cloud SaaS would save telecom operators like yourself infrastructure costas well the application & infrastructure support maintenance cost, as all these facilities will bemanaged, monitored and supported by Evolving Systems. From various analyst reports, over 80% of cloud buyers report meeting their flexible infrastructure objectives, and around 88% expEct to achieve greater benefits from cloud solufign the near-term tuture.
faq4Q: 4. How do I get accurate reports of my inventories?
faq4A: NM SaaS platform enables a central and single data repository for all number inventory, SIMs and associated resources which are managed and tracked in real-time. Operators will be able to generate real-time reports that put you in greater control of your business as well as provide accurate forecasting that includes Regulatory reports.
